input: The function of a Protem Speaker is to

options.A: conduct the proceeding of the House in the absence of the Speaker
options.B: officiate as Speaker when the Speaker is to be elected
options.C: swear members and hold charge till a regular Speaker is elected
options.D: scrutinize the authenticity of the election certificates of members

explanation: Protem Speaker performs the duties of the office of the Speaker from the commencement of the sitting of the new Lok Sabha till the election of the Speaker. Protem speaker is mainly an operating and temporary speaker.
